name: BBSO (Big Black Strap on)
description:
Bring in the strap on to the dark side.  The Black currant and Cherryl add a dark jammy cherry flavor to the original trio.  The water melon, fuji, and strawberry are still present, but a much darker and deep flavor to the mix.  

"I want your cock tail.....Fruit"
- Nasty Nate
author: Deweysuds

reviews.text: Definitely delivers deep darkness as promised. An enjoyable vape, but not among my most favorite strap-ons because that cherry does seem to turn just a smidge toward medicinal for me. I might try it again with just a hair less Black Cherry and hope it keeps its big blackness without any reminder of cough syrup.... or embrace the syrup and add a little something like FW Jungle Juice for a Sizzurp Strap-On.
